game.name: Beach Knights
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동
game.shortDescription: Beach Knights is a 4-player co-op action game. Choose a unique class to battle waves of enemies and take on a climactic boss fight. The Beach King has sent you and your friends as the royal protectors of the coast to work together and slay the beast before it reaches the shore.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Beach Knights is a 4-player co-op action game. Choose a unique class to battle waves of enemies and take on a climactic boss fight. The Beach King has sent you and your friends as the royal protectors of the coast to work together and slay the beast before it reaches the shore.
